name: Just Solitaire - No Ads
description:
Get the Solitaire experience without the interruptions and distractions. Just Solitaire does not have any ads - nor will it ever. Right now, it contains Klondike and Spider. If you would like to see another rule set, leave a review and ask! If we see a lot of something, we'll put it on the roadmap. Features:

* No Ads!
* Original photography card backs
* Klondike and Spider
* Individual customization options for each rule set
* Customization for interaction quality
* 3D effects

Latest changes:
* Made it a native app, so it will run faster
* Optimized the graphics files, so it needs less memory
* Increased minimum OS requirements to Android 7, because older versions don't seem to like it

Thanks go to Chris Aguilar for the card faces!
